MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G64 postcode area of Bishopbriggs. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am due to a fault on our underground cable network and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficult digging conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:51pm on the 14th of April 2021
